title: Mech-Paper Forming&Coat
description: Fundamentals of multiphase flow in paper forming and coating processes, and its impact on the physical properties of composite fiber structure and surface characteristics.

prerequisites: ME 6601 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 6602 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
